TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridItemPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

Docs.summary: Represents child controls of containers that support .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Controls that support <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern> can typically be traversed (that is, a UI Automation client can move to adjacent controls) by using the keyboard.

Docs.summary: Gets the cached property values for this .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>. To get the current value of a property, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.Current%2A>.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation>.

Docs.exception: The requested property is not in the cache.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.
## Examples In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern> object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern> property values.

## Examples In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions.
[!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

Docs.summary: Gets the current property values for this .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> reference in order to get current values. If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation>.

## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.
The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
## Examples In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
[!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#101)]
